body.name: 2-Light Floor Lamp, Mid Century Floor Lamp with White Fabric Shade, Standing Lamp Tall Lamp for Living Room Bedroom, 3 Color Temperatures 9W Bulb Include
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 11 hrs 44 mins
features: THE PERFECT LAMP FOR YOUR HOME - The Karjoefar standing lamp will turn your bedroom, office, or living room into a space of elegance. This tall lamp features a white linen drum lampshade that perfectly combines frosted black and metallic tones. Its generous drum lampshade holds space for two bulbs to cast extra light wherever needed.

ELEGANT E26 LAMP SOCKET DESIGN - This living room lamp has a built-in gold dual E26 Socket design with a drawstring zipper to turn the lamp on/off and change the lamp's color. Each drawstring zipper can control one bulb individually so that you can get bright light from one light. It also contains a foot switch (Note the foot switch is only used to turn the floor lamp on or off)

2 x 9W LED BULBS INCLUDES - No need for additional bulbs. We will provide 2 x 9W LED dimmable bulbs (UL Listed), which are both efficient and environmentally friendly while consuming less energy. The LED bulbs are available in 3 colour temperatures, 3000K/4500K/6500K (warm white/clear white/cool white) for various scenarios.

PREMIUM QUALITY AND SAFE - Karjoefar insists on using advanced manufacturing tech and materials to prioritise quality truly. This mid-century floor lamp is made of high-grade metal and has a weighted base to prevent the lamp from falling; The 6.8ft/2.08m power cord makes it easy to place your LED floor lamp anywhere.

MEMORY FUNCTION AND EASY INSTALLATION - The memory function remembers the last brightness and color you used. This floor lamp is very easy to assemble. Just follow the instructions in the package. No additional tools or parts are required. We proudly stand behind all of our products 100% and offer three-year quality support. If your lamp has any questions, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mid Century Floor Lamp Warm your home Not only is it a floor lamp, but it is also a high-end decoration for your home. Whether your home style is vintage or modern, its stylish design brings a sense of art to your home. Convenient and excellent overall design! Uniquely designed with a metal pull chain, this mid-century floor lamp enhances an elegant, traditional, and rustic touch to your home, convenient to turn on/off by all ages.

E26 Socket This lamp has a built-in gold dual E26 lamp Socket design. It is equipped with 2* dimmable LED bulbs, providing up to 50,000 hours of operation. Drum Lampshade Made from natural linen, the spacious drum shade of the floor lamp accommodates two bulbs to throw extra light where it is needed. Sturdy Metal Base This bright floor lamp ensures excellent stability by adopting a sturdy and weighted base and a metal pole. Foot Switch Pass thousand step test to ensure it works for a long time. A convenient foot switch frees your hands and needs one step to control.

Previous page Place this standing lamp by the sofa for reading and Relaxing, it was simple to set up. Our tall lamp is a good choice for the bedroom. Simple design adds chic style to your room. A modern minimalist look goes well with any decor. Next page 1 Lamps for Living Room 2 Floor Lamp for Dedroom 3 Floor Lamp for Study

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks expensive, feels sturdy, and really pulls the room together
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is one of my favorite purchases from all the housewares we bought from Amazon during our move! It looks so much more expensive than it is, and it feels extremely sturdy. Unlike the other Amazon lamp we purchased, which was clearly spray-painted gold, the gold accents on this lamp are very subtle and not obviously painted. I also love the look of the pulls, which are functional along with the foot pedal. So many different ways to turn the lamp on, depending on how/where you're seated!I see some other reviewers complain about missing parts and difficult assembly. Luckily, we didn't have any of those issues. All parts were present, and it was securely well-packed, plus assembly wasn't too hard. Average, I would say.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chic Lighting with Easy Assembly - 2 Light Floor Lamp
reviews.reviewText: I'm thoroughly impressed with the Karjoefar 2-Light Floor Lamp! It's stylish, functional, and incredibly easy to put together. It's the perfect addition to my home office, providing both ambient and task lighting while complementing my existing furniture.First impression:Effortless AssemblyPremium Quality - Black is my favoriteMid-Century Modern Style lampThe two lights offer both ambient and task lighting optionsNote:While the assembly was easy, it would be helpful if the power cord were slightly longer for more convenient placement options.It's a great value for the price and has quickly become a favorite piece in my home office. If you're looking for a chic and functional lamp, this is definitely one to consider!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars DOES NOT WORK! ):
reviews.reviewText: Directions to put it together was straight forward. Took about 5-10 mins. HOWEVER, after plugging it and and trying the foot button, the light wouldn't come on. I tried different outlets too. I tried the bulbs on another lamp and the bulbs works. There is something wrong with the wiring on the lamp that make it so the lamp wont turn on. Hopefully the seller or amazon will figure out a solution that prevents me from returning it, it looks really nice ):UPDATE: 1 star to a 4 starI took apart the foot button by unscrewing four screws. Turns out whoever put the wiring together did not solder one of the wires to the connection block. All I did was twist the wire around a metal plate thru a hole to complete the electrical path. Works perfectly now! The provided bulb is nice and bright with three colors, lamp doesn't look cheap, and looks great in the living room. One star taken off bc of the faulty connection which was fixed easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly and classic looking lamp
reviews.reviewText: I really loved how easy it was to put the lamp together and its color. It is very sturdy. I thought the gold part would look like it’ll peel but it’s actually not. The bulbs that came with it were also very bright. It lit up my 12x13 room quiet well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality control
reviews.reviewText: The item looks nice, but the bottom section of the lamp pole is too wide to screw together. The upper section just pushes past the threads and makes the entire lamp wobbly. Returned and would not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice soft light and looks great!
reviews.reviewText: Lamp is really nice. It brings a soft light to my living room and was not too difficult to put together. The on switches are pull strings on the 2 light bulbs so it is convenient to turn on even if it is plugged in behind furniture, etc.I'm very happy with this lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lamp pole is slightly crooked when screwed in, lamp shade is low quality and looks like a DIY project. Okay for college dorm rooms, not great quality for adult homes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Shade isn't the greatest.
reviews.reviewText: The base was made very well but the shade was a mess. The shade I had to assemble as well and it being all folded in the box the shade is all crumpled. Still I like the lamp.
Me gustó mucho la lámpara. Sobre todo considerando el precio. Lo único malo es que una de las piezas fue incorrecta y tuve que intervenir para corregirla.
looks great easy to ensamble. I didn t have problems with the lamp shade. it came out nice, just take your time to put it together.
Es hermosa. Muy elegante, pero esta algo inclinada, aunque se puede ignorar.

reviews.reviewTitle: contemporary lamp but shade needs improvement
reviews.reviewText: The lamp shade arrived rolled up and tightly strapped. Upon unravelling there is a dent in the shade from the strap. The quality of the shade is a disappointment

reviews.reviewerName: Excelente producto, tiene una guía para hacer el corte el acabado final es sorprendente
reviews.reviewText: Me encantó la calidad, el empacado y sobre todo como luce es exactamente como se muestra en las fotos, excelente lámpara
